wizard.text:
... yes? Can I help you?
A HAT you say?
No, I haven't seen anything like that, sorry, can't help you.

Look I already told you ... what's that?
MY hat, you say?
Absolutely not. Now piss off.

Oh my actual god.
Sod it. If I give you my hat will you leave me alone?

signB:
Control Scheme:
up to up, down to down, left to left, right to right
space to do thing
x to die
